original_text: When Jesus got out of the boat there, a man from the town came towards him. Bad spirits were living inside him. He had not worn any clothes for a long time. He did not live in a house. Instead, he lived outside, among some graves.
korean_text: 예수께서 육지에 내리시매 그 도시 사람으로서 귀신 들린 자 하나가 예수를 만나니 그 사람은 오래 옷을 입지 아니하며 집에 거하지도 아니하고 무덤 사이에 거하는 자라

sentences.original_text: When Jesus got out of the boat there
a man from the town came towards him
sentences.korean_translation: 그 마을 사람 한 사람이 그에게로 다가왔다

sentences.original_text: Bad spirits were living inside him
sentences.korean_translation: 악한 영들이 그의 안에 살고 있었다

sentences.original_text: He had not worn any clothes for a long time
He did not live in a house
